author: Staff Reporter
text:
Villagers of Varapalayam and Sandhiya Poongodi Nagar in Tiruchengode picketed the office of the panchayat union here on Tuesday protesting against poor supply of drinking water.

They said that there are over 100 households in these areas.

But the water supplied to them was mixed with clay and supplied to them for less than 30 minutes.

They said that they are unable to use the water and were forced to purchase from other sources. When they questioned the tank operator, he refused to give proper information.

They said that the tank operator also threatened them. Hence, demanding action against him and demanding regular supply of protected drinking water, over 30 residents, including women, picketed the panchayat union office.
title: Villagers picket panchayat office
